Articles.Content:
something happened i dont know what. I tried uninstalling KSP from Steam and installing it again but that didnt work my mods are still there?

Is there a way i can get new KSP files? i also tried deleting the mods but that didnt work PLS help

Alright, what you need to do is get to your Kerbal Space Program folder (in your Steam installation directory; by default, it'd be C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\Steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program) and delete everything in it. Everything (excepting the Saves folder, if you want to keep your saves). Then, go right ahead and either uninstall/reinstall KSP via your Steam Library.
you can also rename your ksp folder and reinstall it from steam .. so you can play diffrent versions (moded or unmoded) just launch the game from the KSP.exe in the folder(s)
